data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Gaming #5: Dragons & Giants (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This product contains over 200 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with software like Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales and/or software. The tokens are sorted and scaled into different size categories, and are convered to PNG files for optimal online use.

This token pack includes (in various sizes):

  • Amojhi Dragon
  • Black Dragon
  • Blue Dragon
  • Brass Dragon
  • Bronze Dragon
  • Copper Dragon
  • Dragon Faerie
  • Dragonne
  • Drake
  • Gold Dragon
  • Green Dragon
  • HalfDragon
  • Pseudodragon
  • Red Dragon
  • Sapphire Dragon
  • Sea Dragon
  • Shadow Dragon
  • Silver Dragon
  • Skeletal Dragon
  • Smoke Dragon
  • White Dragon
  • Hecatoncheire
  • Giant Storm Male
  • Giant Sea Lesser
  • 2 Giants Cloud
  • Giant Fire Boy
  • Wood Giant
  • Troll Swamp
  • 2 Trolls
  • Ogre Rogue Female
  • Ogre Rogue Male
  • Ogre Mage
  • Ogre Fighter Male
  • Ogre Fighter Female
  • Ogre Female
  • Ogre Druid Male
  • Ogre Cleric Female
  • 3 Ogres
  • Merchants Bane Large
  • 2 Giants Stone
  • 2 Giants Hill
  • 2 Giants Frost
  • Giant Fire Sorcerer
  • Giant Fire Queen
  • Giant Fire King
  • Giant Fire Female
  • Giant Fire Bodyguard
  • 2 Giants Fire
  • Geryon
  • 2 Ettins Male
  • Ettin Female
  • Cyclops Lesser
  • Cyclops Greater
  • Cavern Giant
  • Bicephalous Troll
  • Bhuta
  • Argos Panoptes
  • Adithari
  • Cave Troll
  • Antaeus
  • Giant Fire Warrior
  • Giant Owl
  • Giant Eagle
  • Giant Storm
  • Humbaba
  • Giant Sea
  • Splinterking

Released on June 01, 2004. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This product contains over 200 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with software like Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales and/or software.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
